Articles.Content:
I need help! I have an 0.625 heat-sheild on my payload bays from sounding rockets,(dev version) and when I ignite my second stage, shortly after the heat-sheild overheats and explodes.

mods(that may effect. might be a different mod, but these are the ones in use)

vens stock part revamp

deadly re-entry continued

ferram aerospace

sounding rockets

EVE

(doesn't usualy do this, but shortly after my game crashed.)
